Judul: FINANCIAL RATIO ANALYSIS TO DISTINGUISH JOINT VENTURE GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY PERFORMANCE USING DISCRIMINANT ANALYSIS
Abstrak: Insurance industry stands as a service business that plays a significant role in Indonesia economical condition. The development of insurance industry in Indonesia both in general insurance and life insurance has increased very speedy. The development of general insurance industry itself is divided into two major players which are local private company and Joint Venture Company. Over decades, the use of statistical techniques and financial ratios models to assist financial institution such as insurance company have been used as one of appropriate combination in predicting the performance of an industry. This research however aims to distinguish between Joint Venture General Insurance Companies that have a good performance and those who are not performing well. how two populations which are using Discriminant Analysis.
Kata Kunci: General Insurance, Financial Ratio, Discriminant Analysis
